description:
Major Sign Manufacturer is seeking an experienced Metal Fabrication Supervisor for its manufacturing location in Anaheim, CA.

Job Summary:

Implements production activities, meets production goals, and supervises a team of over 40 employees. Oversee aluminum and steel Fabrication, Welding, Waterjet, Sheers, and Break Press machinery. Must have Excellent verbal and written communication skills with excellent follow-through. Computer Skills are a must.

Responsibilities:

Review and prioritize production schedules with the team leaders and production scheduler.

Read and analyze work orders, production schedules, and reports determining production requirements to evaluate current production estimates and outputs.

Communicate with other teams and employees to coordinate operations and activities between departments to ensure products are built and assembled.

Maintain employees’ weekly timecards.

Maintain a safe work environment.

Conduct monthly safety training for all employees.

Must have 5 to 10 years of supervisory experience in a manufacturing environment. We are an Equal Opportunity Employer.

Company Description

Since 1964, Coast Sign has engineered placemaking, identity and discovery on behalf of companies across all major industries. Through a mission founded in providing quality products, services, and customer service, we’ve evolved to become a trusted industry leader and partner to the world’s biggest brands. Our industry-recognized success is a product of strong partners, supplier relationships, and a firm commitment to innovative, sustainable practices.

We offer full-service nationwide signage solutions in various industries, custom-fit to each client’s needs and specifications.
